706531f-a.text:
Rodney Street, south side, at and east of Bedford Ave., showing at the corner the Oscar Hawley Mansion, purchased by the Hanover Club in 1891 for 327,000 and enlarged. Ihh 1922, a Jewish Society known as the " Young Israel
of williamsburg" purchased the club forS 35,000.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
